resources.string: Two-thousand years ago seven wonders were known to the world, grandest of them was the Great Pyramid of Cheops.
The evil vizier, Nebtawi, has hidden magical ankhs around the Great Pyramid, stealing its power for himself.
Fly your magic carpet quickly and collect the ankhs before all Egypt falls under Nebtawi\'s evil spell.
Tilt left and right to turn your magic carpet, and lean forward and backward to speed up and slow down.
